Design System
=============

**Error**

![Figma](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

### Rock RMS Component Library

The Rock RMS Component Library contains the most common components used inside of Rock. It relies on the use of Figma components and styles to allow for the quick creation of new interface designs for Rock.

[View on Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/G3RXYkFDLRAJzXxKgtUCVSeZ/Rock-RMS-Component-Library)
